javadoc.text: * PStack this class should be removed when a non thread safe stack is * added to the java class libraries. *
javadoc.author: Jesse Grosjean

javadoc.text: * Allows for future serialization code to understand versioned binary * formats.
* Pushes the provided object onto the top of the stack.
javadoc.param: o object to add to the stack

javadoc.text: * Returns topmost element on the stack, or null if stack is empty.
javadoc.return: topmost element on the stack, or null if empty

javadoc.text: * Removes top element on the stack and returns it.
